collation.cr: [normalization on] [reorder Beng Deva Guru Gujr Orya Taml Telu Knda Mlym Sinh] # # The following tailoring is an adjustment of the # DUCET collation order for ANUSVARA, CANDRABINDU, # and VISARGA. Instead of being sorted with secondary # weights, they are collated on primary level between # the independent vowels and the consonants. # &ঔ<ং<ঁ<ঃ # # KHANDA-TA is sorted before TA. # &[before 1]ত<ৎ=ত্\u200D # # KSSA is sorted after HA. # &হ<ক্ষ
